title: Big Hole National Battlefield: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Looking for how to get involved Big Hole? Browse through the website navigation or use the search tool to find opportunities.  NPS Centennial The National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016. As we lead up to the centennial, we invite you to participate in Find Your Park Experiences to learn, discover, be inspired, or simply have fun in national parks.    Volunteer Imagine spending your summers in beautiful western Montana while helping the National Park Service in our efforts toward education and preservation.    Work With Us People are what make Big Hole National Battlefield a living place. Big Hole from time to time has open positions.
